name: edk-route-verifier
description: Extreme Way of the Cross project route verifier

scripts.bundle:dist: browserify src/routeVerifier.js > dist/edk-route-verifier.js && uglifyjs dist/edk-route-verifier.js > dist/edk-route-verifier.min.js
scripts.start: npm run bundle && cd server && npm run start
scripts.git:branch: cross-var git branch post-$npm_package_version && cross-var git checkout post-$npm_package_version
scripts.git:commit: git add dist/* && git commit --amend -m "Added artifacts for new version"
scripts.deploy: npm run git:branch && npm run version:patch && npm run bundle:dist && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push && npm run clean

author: Jakub Niezgoda
